name: mathjax-full
description: Beautiful math in all browsers. MathJax is an open-source JavaScript display engine for LaTeX, MathML, and AsciiMath notation that works in all browsers. This package includes the source code as well as the packaged components.

scripts.clean: npm run --silent clean:js && npm run --silent clean:es5 && npm run --silent clean:esm && npm run --silent clean:lib
scripts.compile: npm run --silent compile:js && npm run --silent compile:esm
scripts.postcompile:js: npm run --silent copy:mhchem:js && npm run --silent copy:mj2:js
scripts.postcompile:esm: npm run --silent copy:mhchem:esm && npm run --silent copy:mj2:esm
scripts.premake-components: npm run --silent clean:es5 && npm run --silent clean:lib
scripts.make-components: cd components && node bin/makeAll src | grep 'Building\|Webpacking\|Copying\|npx'
